isis.stitle: TSI 01-08-01 - Erratic Exhaust Pipe Pyrometer Gauge, Code 16HGK, Needle Movement in 5000, 5000i, 9000, and 9000i Models Built Before January 01, 2000 with CB Radios

subjectgroup.subject: Erratic Exhaust Pipe Pyrometer Gauge, Code 16HGK, Needle Movement in 5000, 5000i, 9000, and 9000i Models Built Before January 01, 2000 with CB Radios

geninfo.para: 5000, 5000i, 9000, and 9000i Models built before January 01, 2000 with CB radios and exhaust pipe pyrometer gauge, Code 16HGK, may experience erratic needle movement of the pyrometer gauge when the CB radio microphone is keyed. This issue can be corrected by twisting together the two wire leads from the exhaust pipe thermocouple to the instrument panel connector.

svcproc.title: Service Procedure
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 1 for the following Steps.

step1.para: Remove the thermocouple from the exhaust pipe.
Twist the thermocouple wires from the thermocouple to the dash panel together until there is approximately one complete twist (revolution) per inch of wire length.
Re-install the thermocouple into the exhaust pipe.
Disconnect connector 492 at the pyrometer control module.

important.para: The direction of twist for the two pair of wires in the next Step must be in opposite directions.

step1.para: Twist the two wires from connector 492 to the main trunk of the cab harness approximately one twist (revolution) per inch of wire and the two wires from connector 492 to the pyrometer control module one twist (revolution) per inch of wire in the opposite direction.
